page.title: 11Farming 4
page.content: TIGHTS FARM,BAXTERS GREEN 40.5Hectares 1984. 24.28Ha Barley. (Grown for feed) 14.16Ha Pasture.(Grazing/Hay) 01.50Ha Woodland/Cover. 1985. Stock includes 120 beef cattle, 400 pigs and 5 race horses.Cattle and pigs supply local outlets at Sainsburys,Haverhill and the farmers' own butchery at Newmarket(renowned locally for pork products). Pigs are reared in deep litter units. Three men are employed on this highly mechanized farm. Careful livestock records are updated frequently. The farm has no conservation policy but retains hedges and woodland cover.
